channel.title: Dedicated Server relevance
channel.description:
I just had a quick question for the players of these servers.
I have a Server up that is in my signature, but im wonder if i put it on a dedicated server would more players play.
If I got a dedicated server would you play? Does NOT having a dedicated Server Prevent you from Playing?

item.title: Dedicated Server relevance
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

[quote=“Vibes, post:3, topic:530428”][quote author=Rodgerwilco link=topic=649188.msg4363524#msg4363524 date=1379205144]
It’ll get you slightly more availability but not a lot of players. You will need to heavily advertise.
[/quote]
as for Advertising, where are some good spots to do so?[/quote]

Every website you can think of, with rsc you can’t be selective

Read full topic
